sections.name: Items
content: To define an item, the item definition must be defined in the behavior pack in a JSON file.
All attributes, including item names, must be defined using item components.

sections.name: Item Definition Properties
content: The properties are part of the Item Definition. This helps the system determine how to parse and initialize this item.

rows.Name: format_version
rows.Description: Specifies the version of the game this entity was made in. If the version is lower than the current version, any changes made to the entity in the vanilla version will be applied to it.

rows.Name: minecraft:item
rows.Description: Item definition, which includes the "description" and "components" sections.

sections.name: Code Example
content: Example
"format_version": "1.20.20",
"minecraft:item": {
"description": {
"identifier": "minecraft:blaze_rod"
"components": {
"minecraft:fuel": {
"duration": 120.0
"minecraft:max_stack_size": 64,
"minecraft:icon": {
"texture": "blaze_rod"
"minecraft:hand_equipped": true,
"minecraft:display_name": {
"value": "Blaze Rod"

sections.name: components v1.20.50
content: List of all components that used in this item.

rows.Name: minecraft:allow_off_hand
rows.Description: The allow off hand component determines whether the item can be placed in the off hand slot of the inventory.

rows.Name: minecraft:block_placer
rows.Description: Block Placer item component. Items with this component will place a block when used.Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features (in format versions before 1.20.10)

rows.Name: minecraft:can_destroy_in_creative
rows.Description: The can destroy in creative component determines if the item will break blocks in creative when swinging.

rows.Name: minecraft:cooldown
rows.Description: Cool down time for a component. After you use an item, all items specified with the same `cool down category` setting becomes unusable for the duration specified by the 'cool down time' setting in this component.Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features (in format versions before 1.20.10)

rows.Name: minecraft:damage
rows.Description: The damage component determines how much extra damage the item does on attack.

rows.Name: minecraft:digger
rows.Description: Digger item component. You can specify how quickly this item can dig specific blocks.

rows.Name: minecraft:display_name
rows.Description: Display Name item component. Determines the text shown whenever an item's name is displayed (ex. hover text).Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features (in format versions before 1.20.0)

rows.Name: minecraft:durability
rows.Description: Durability item component. Determines how much damage this item takes before breaking and allows the item to be combined in crafting.Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features (in format versions before 1.20.0)

rows.Name: minecraft:enchantable
rows.Description: The enchantable component determines what enchantments can be applied to the item. Not all enchantments will have an effect on all item components.

rows.Name: minecraft:entity_placer
rows.Description: Entity placer item component. You can specifiy allowed blocks that the item is restricted to.Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features (in format versions before 1.20.0)

rows.Name: minecraft:food
rows.Description: When an item has a food component, it becomes edible to the player. Must have the 'minecraft:use_duration' component in order to function properly.Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features (in format versions before 1.20.30)

rows.Name: minecraft:fuel
rows.Description: Fuel item component. Allows this item to be used as fuel in a furnace to 'cook' other items.Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features (in format versions before 1.20.0)

rows.Name: minecraft:glint
rows.Description: The glint component determines whether the item has the enchanted glint render effect on it.

rows.Name: minecraft:hand_equipped
rows.Description: This component determines if an item is rendered like a tool while in hand.

rows.Name: minecraft:hover_text_color
rows.Description: The hover text color component determines the color of the item name when hovering over it.

rows.Name: minecraft:icon
rows.Description: Icon item component. Determines the icon to represent the item in the UI and elsewhere.Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features (in format versions before 1.20.0)

rows.Name: minecraft:interact_button
rows.Description: This component is a boolean or string that determines if the interact button is shown in touch controls and what text is displayed on the button. When set as true, default "Use Item" text will be used.

rows.Name: minecraft:liquid_clipped
rows.Description: The liquid clipped component determines whether the item interacts with liquid blocks on use.

rows.Name: minecraft:max_stack_size
rows.Description: The max stack size component determines how many of the item can be stacked together.

rows.Name: minecraft:projectile
rows.Description: Projectile item component. projectile items shoot out, like an arrow.Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features (in format versions before 1.20.10)

rows.Name: minecraft:record
rows.Description: Record Item Component. Used by record items to play music. Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features (in format versions before 1.20.10)

rows.Name: minecraft:repairable
rows.Description: Repairable item component. Determines the items that can be used to repair this item along with how much durability they repair.Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features (in format versions before 1.20.10)

rows.Name: minecraft:shooter
rows.Description: Shooter Item Component. Must have the 'minecraft:use_duration' component in order to function properly.Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features (in format versions before 1.20.10)

rows.Name: minecraft:should_despawn
rows.Description: Should despawn component determines if the item should eventually despawn while floating in the world

rows.Name: minecraft:stacked_by_data
rows.Description: The stacked by data component determines if the same item with different aux values can stack. Also defines whether the item actors can merge while floating in the world.

rows.Name: minecraft:tags
rows.Description: The tags component determines which tags an item has on it.

rows.Name: minecraft:throwable
rows.Description: Throwable item component. Throwable items, such as a snowball.Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features (in format versions before 1.20.10)

rows.Name: minecraft:use_animation
rows.Description: This component determines which animation plays when using the item.

rows.Name: minecraft:use_modifiers
rows.Description: This component modifies use effects, including how long the item takes to use and the player's speed when used in combination with components like Shooter, Throwable or Food.

rows.Name: minecraft:wearable
rows.Description: Wearable item component.Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features (in format versions before 1.20.20)

sections.name: description v1.20.10
content: List of characters of an item. The description MUST contain an identifier; the other fields are optional.

rows.Name: identifier
rows.Description: The identifier for this item. The name must include a namespace and must not use the Minecraft namespace unless overriding a Vanilla item.

rows.Name: menu_category
rows.Description: The creative group name and category for this item.

sections.name: menu_category v1.20.10
content: The creative group name and category for this item.

rows.Name: category
rows.Description: The Creative Category that this item belongs to. Defaults to "items".

rows.Name: group
rows.Description: The Creative Group that this item belongs to. Group name is limited to 256 characters.

rows.Name: is_hidden_in_commands
rows.Description: Determines whether or not this item can be used with commands. Commands can use items by default.

sections.name: minecraft:allow_off_hand
content: The allow off hand component determines whether the item can be placed in the off hand slot of the inventory.

rows.Name: value
rows.Description: Whether the item can be placed in the off hand slot.

sections.name: minecraft:block_placer
content: Block Placer item component. Items with this component will place a block when used.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features (in format versions before 1.20.10)

rows.Name: block
rows.Description: Defines the block that will be placed.

rows.Name: use_on
rows.Description: List of block descriptors that contain blocks that this item can be used on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.

sections.name: minecraft:can_destroy_in_creative
content: The can destroy in creative component determines if the item will break blocks in creative when swinging.

rows.Name: value
rows.Description: Whether the item can destroy blocks while in creative.

sections.name: minecraft:cooldown
content: Cool down time for a component. After you use an item, all items specified with the same `cool down category` setting becomes unusable for the duration specified by the 'cool down time' setting in this component.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features (in format versions before 1.20.10)

rows.Name: category
rows.Description: The type of cool down for this item. All items with a cool down component with the same category are put on cool down when one is used.

rows.Name: duration
rows.Description: The duration of time (in seconds) items with a matching category will spend cooling down before becoming usable again.

sections.name: minecraft:damage
content: The damage component determines how much extra damage the item does on attack.

rows.Name: value
rows.Description: How much extra damage the item does, must be a positive number.

sections.name: minecraft:digger v1.20.50
content: Digger item component. You can specify how quickly this item can dig specific blocks.

rows.Name: destroy_speeds
rows.Description: A list of blocks to dig with correlating speeds of digging.

rows.Name: use_efficiency
rows.Description: Whether this item should be impacted if the efficiency enchant is applied to it.

sections.name: minecraft:display_name
content: Display Name item component. Determines the text shown whenever an item's name is displayed (ex. hover text).
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features (in format versions before 1.20.0)

rows.Name: value
rows.Description: The display name for an item.

sections.name: minecraft:durability
content: Durability item component. Determines how much damage this item takes before breaking and allows the item to be combined in crafting.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features (in format versions before 1.20.0)

rows.Name: damage_chance
rows.Description: Damage chance is the percentage chance of this item losing durability. Default is set to 100. Defined as an int range with min and max value.

rows.Name: max_durability
rows.Description: Max durability is the amount of damage that this item can take before breaking. This is a required parameter and has a minimum of 0.

sections.name: minecraft:enchantable
content: The enchantable component determines what enchantments can be applied to the item. Not all enchantments will have an effect on all item components.

rows.Name: slot
rows.Description: What enchantments can be applied (ex. Using `bow` would allow this item to be enchanted as if it were a bow).

rows.Name: value
rows.Description: The value of the enchantment (minimum of 0).

sections.name: minecraft:entity_placer
content: Entity placer item component. You can specifiy allowed blocks that the item is restricted to.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features (in format versions before 1.20.0)

rows.Name: dispense_on
rows.Description: List of block descriptors that contain blocks that this item can be dispensed on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.

rows.Name: entity
rows.Description: The entity to be placed in the world.

rows.Name: use_on
rows.Description: List of block descriptors that contain blocks that this item can be used on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.

sections.name: minecraft:food v1.20.30
content: When an item has a food component, it becomes edible to the player. Must have the 'minecraft:use_duration' component in order to function properly.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features (in format versions before 1.20.30)

rows.Name: can_always_eat
rows.Description: If true you can always eat this item (even when not hungry). Default is set to false.

rows.Name: nutrition
rows.Description: The value that is added to the actor's nutrition when the item is used. Default is set to 0.

rows.Name: saturation_modifier
rows.Description: Saturation Modifier is used in this formula: (nutrition * saturation_modifier * 2) when applying the saturation buff. Default is set to 0.6.

rows.Name: using_converts_to
rows.Description: When used, converts to the item specified by the string in this field. Default does not convert item.

sections.name: minecraft:fuel
content: Fuel item component. Allows this item to be used as fuel in a furnace to 'cook' other items.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features (in format versions before 1.20.0)

rows.Name: duration
rows.Description: How long in seconds will this fuel cook items for.

sections.name: minecraft:glint
content: The glint component determines whether the item has the enchanted glint render effect on it.

rows.Name: value
rows.Description: Whether the item has the glint effect.

sections.name: minecraft:hand_equipped
content: This component determines if an item is rendered like a tool while in hand.

rows.Name: value
rows.Description: If the item is rendered like a tool while in hand.

sections.name: minecraft:hover_text_color
content: The hover text color component determines the color of the item name when hovering over it.

rows.Name: value
rows.Description: The color of the item's hover text.

sections.name: minecraft:icon
content: Icon item component. Determines the icon to represent the item in the UI and elsewhere.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features (in format versions before 1.20.0)

rows.Name: texture
rows.Description: The key from the resource_pack/textures/item_texture.json 'texture_data' object associated with the texture file.

sections.name: minecraft:interact_button
content: This component is a boolean or string that determines if the interact button is shown in touch controls and what text is displayed on the button. When set as true, default "Use Item" text will be used.

sections.name: minecraft:item v1.20.50
content: Item definition, which includes the "description" and "components" sections.

rows.Name: components
rows.Description: List of all components that used in this item.

rows.Name: description
rows.Description: List of characters of an item. The description MUST contain an identifier; the other fields are optional.

sections.name: minecraft:liquid_clipped
content: The liquid clipped component determines whether the item interacts with liquid blocks on use.

rows.Name: value
rows.Description: Whether the item interacts with liquid blocks on use.

sections.name: minecraft:max_stack_size
content: The max stack size component determines how many of the item can be stacked together.

rows.Name: value
rows.Description: How many of the item that can be stacked.

sections.name: minecraft:projectile
content: Projectile item component. projectile items shoot out, like an arrow.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features (in format versions before 1.20.10)

rows.Name: minimum_critical_power
rows.Description: How long you must charge a projectile for it to critically hit.

rows.Name: projectile_entity
rows.Description: The entity to be fired as a projectile.

sections.name: minecraft:record
content: Record Item Component. Used by record items to play music.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features (in format versions before 1.20.10)

rows.Name: comparator_signal
rows.Description: Signal strength for comparator blocks to use, from 1 - 13.

rows.Name: duration
rows.Description: Duration of sound event in seconds, float value.

rows.Name: sound_event
rows.Description: Sound event type: 13, cat, blocks, chirp, far, mall, mellohi, stal, strad, ward, 11, wait, pigstep, otherside, 5, relic.

sections.name: minecraft:repairable
content: Repairable item component. Determines the items that can be used to repair this item along with how much durability they repair.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features (in format versions before 1.20.10)

rows.Name: repair_items
rows.Description: List of repair item entries. Each entry needs to define a list of strings for `items` that can be used for the repair and an optional `repair_amount` for how much durability is repaired.

sections.name: minecraft:shooter
content: Shooter Item Component. Must have the 'minecraft:use_duration' component in order to function properly.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features (in format versions before 1.20.10)

rows.Name: ammunition
rows.Description: Ammunition.

rows.Name: charge_on_draw
rows.Description: Charge on draw? Default is set to false.

rows.Name: max_draw_duration
rows.Description: Draw Duration. Default is set to 0.

rows.Name: scale_power_by_draw_duration
rows.Description: Scale power by draw duration? Default is set to false.

sections.name: minecraft:should_despawn
content: Should despawn component determines if the item should eventually despawn while floating in the world

rows.Name: value
rows.Description: Whether the item should eventually despawn while floating in the world

sections.name: minecraft:stacked_by_data
content: The stacked by data component determines if the same item with different aux values can stack. Also defines whether the item actors can merge while floating in the world.

rows.Name: value
rows.Description: Whether the same item with different aux values can stack. Also defines whether the item actors can merge while floating in the world.

sections.name: minecraft:tags
content: The tags component determines which tags an item has on it.

rows.Name: tags
rows.Description: An array that can contain multiple item tags.

sections.name: minecraft:throwable
content: Throwable item component. Throwable items, such as a snowball.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features (in format versions before 1.20.10)

rows.Name: do_swing_animation
rows.Description: Whether the item should use the swing animation when thrown. Default is set to false.

rows.Name: launch_power_scale
rows.Description: The scale at which the power of the throw increases. Default is set to 1.0.

rows.Name: max_draw_duration
rows.Description: The maximum duration to draw a throwable item. Default is set to 0.0.

rows.Name: max_launch_power
rows.Description: The maximum power to launch the throwable item. Default is set to 1.0.

rows.Name: min_draw_duration
rows.Description: The minimum duration to draw a throwable item. Default is set to 0.0.

rows.Name: scale_power_by_draw_duration
rows.Description: Whether or not the power of the throw increases with duration charged. Default is set to false.

sections.name: minecraft:use_animation
content: This component determines which animation plays when using the item.

rows.Name: value
rows.Description: Which animation to play when using the item.

sections.name: minecraft:use_modifiers v1.20.50
content: This component modifies use effects, including how long the item takes to use and the player's speed when used in combination with components like Shooter, Throwable or Food.

rows.Name: movement_modifier
rows.Description: Modifier value to scale the players movement speed when item is in use.

rows.Name: use_duration
rows.Description: How long the item takes to use in seconds.

sections.name: minecraft:wearable
content: Wearable item component.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features (in format versions before 1.20.20)

rows.Name: protection
rows.Description: How much protection the wearable item has. Default is set to 0.

rows.Name: slot
rows.Description: Determines where the item can be worn. If any non-hand slot is chosen, the max stack size is set to 1.
